General.Name: Selic Corp Public Company Limited
General.Description: Selic Corp Public Company Limited produces and distributes industrial adhesives in Thailand. The company offers hot melt, water based, and solvent based adhesives; and services, such as sample testing, consultation, recommendation, production line audit, foundation training, and others. It also produces and distributes self-adhesive labels and healthcare products; and engages in the wholesale of industrial chemicals. The company serves various industries, such as leather and shoes, furniture, packaging and labelling, food and beverage, printing, woodworking, automotive parts, etc. It also offers its products in Asia, Australia, Africa, and the United States. The company was founded in 1979 and is based in Bangkok, Thailand.
General.Address: 270 Liap Khlong Phasi Charoen Road, Bangkok, Thailand, 10160
